name: Mr. Downbeat
description:
Mr. Downbeat 

A recreation of Mr. Upbeat made completely in web Construct 3 using a Xbox One.

Keyboard Controls

Z - Lift Left leg

X - Lift Right leg

R - Reset Game

Spacebar - Start

Backspace - Hide Mobile buttons

Shift - Show Mobile buttons

Mobile Controls

Left Arrow - Lift Left leg

Right Arrow - Lift Right leg

Upwards Arrow - Start

Mouse Controls

Left Click - Lift Left leg

Right Click - Lift Right leg

Scroll Button - Start
